definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.chinese: 我們可以共乘一輛車啊。

sentences.english: End with a shared taxi ride to Kigali, Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: 最後可以共乘的士去盧旺達的基加利。

sentences.english: Do you need a ride?We can car pool.
sentences.chinese: 你需不需要我在你啊，我們可以共乘一輛車。

sentences.english: Need to think creatively about car pooling and combining errands
sentences.chinese: 需要創造性地考慮汽車共乘和聯合差使。

definition: to mount (a horse, bike, flight of stairs, rickshaw etc)
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to urge on a horse using a whip or spurs
variant of 聯袂|联袂[lian2 mei4]
to whip on/to raise a whip/by ext. to swagger
